text: Mihály Dávid (July 31, 1886 – 1944) was a Hungarian athlete who competed mainly in the shot put. He competed for a Hungary in the 1906 Intercalated Games held in Athens in the shot put where he won the silver medal. == References == * Category:1886 births Category:1944 deaths Category:People from Bistrița-Năsăud County Category:Hungarian male shot putters Category:Olympic athletes of Hungary Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary Category:Medalists at the 1906 Intercalated Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1906 Intercalated Games
title: Mihály Dávid
